scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run build:setup && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.build:setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:api: mkdir -p .vercel/output/functions/api.func && cp -r api/* .vercel/output/functions/api.func/ && cp -r node_modules .vercel/output/functions/api.func/ && cp package.json .vercel/output/functions/api.func/ && echo '{"runtime": "nodejs18.x", "handler": "index.js"}' > .vercel/output/functions/api.func/.vc-config.json
